pipeline.name: r-copy-localtask
pipeline.description: Use R to create tsv file and import into 'myassay' (localtask)

task.script: # Generate a dummy tsv output file with two columns (Name, Age) and two rows. df <- data.frame(Name=c("Bob", "Sally"), Age=c(10, 20)) write.table(df, file="${output.tsv}", sep="\t", qmethod="double", col.names=TRUE, row.names=FALSE)
